text: 2:7 Aposel 9:15; Galesia 1:16; 2:7-8; Efesus 3:7-8; 2 Timoti 1:11Egha ingangarir kam bagha, God aposel ko akam akunamin gumazimɨn ikiasa na mɨsefe. Kɨ guizbangɨra mɨgei, kɨ ifarir puvatɨ. A Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar sure damuasa ingangarim na ganɨngi, eghtɨ me nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Kraisɨn ikɨva guizɨn akam gɨfogham.
